meanings.definition: A large boat designed for maximum capacity and performance.
meanings.sent1: The maxiboat sailed smoothly across the vast ocean.
meanings.sent2: We saw a majestic maxiboat docked at the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The maxiboat was so big, it could fit an entire town!
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was a maxiboat, always aiming for the biggest and best.
meanings.sent5: The maxiboat's engines roared as it raced through the waves.

meanings.definition: To travel or transport goods by a large boat.
meanings.sent1: We decided to maxiboat our cargo to the island.
meanings.sent2: They maxiboated across the sea to deliver the supplies.
meanings.sent3: The pirates tried to maxiboat the treasure, but it was too heavy!
meanings.sent4: His dreams of success would maxiboat him to far-off lands.
meanings.sent5: The decision to maxiboat the goods saved them time and effort.

meanings.definition: The act of owning or operating a large boat.
meanings.sent1: His maxiboat business was thriving in the busy port.
meanings.sent2: She inherited the family's maxiboat after her father retired.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best maxiboat was fierce among the captains.
meanings.sent4: Owning a maxiboat was his lifelong dream, finally realized.
meanings.sent5: The prestige of owning a maxiboat was unmatched in the maritime community.
